Text: I'm a fan of the Coens and I've never heard of this movie.  Thanks.
this is NOT a coens bros film...it is directed by SAM RAIMI
As stated in the nfo this film was co-written by Joel and Ethan Coen.
Sam Raimis second film, made shortly after the release of The Evil Dead.  First title was 'The XYZ Murders' and retitled before release.

crimewave is only ok.
but it could be brilliant.
written by sam raimi & the coen brothers.
but the company didn't let them do the film
they wanted.
a lot of compromises where made.
the leading role was written for
bruce campbell but he was given a much
smaller part.

sam raimi & the coen brothers worked together
on the hudsucker proxy as well
Thanks mate, this movie is most amusing.
